recipesJson.name: Kiwistrawars
recipesJson.author: ooooNaSuGamisoooo
recipesJson.description:
__________________________
 ⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️
 (FA)Kiwi is (VTA) Kiwi 
 (Not in ATF database) 
⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️⚠️
__________________________

This is a fun mix that turned out
very nice!!!
i had a craving for something fruity 
and sweet
so i mixed this up by smelling some of the flavors
the star of the show is definitely
mangosteen that paired perfectly with the kiwis

__________________________
